strapiPost.title: One Final Outing
strapiPost.content:
Welp.. That's a wrap for the No. 1 Arkansas baseball team. Last night the hogs lost the best of a 3 game series to NC State putting an end to their legendary season.

  • In short: The best player in college baseball started on the mound last night for the Razorbacks, but even he couldn't keep NC State's bats at bay. They took the lead in the 8th inning with a solo home run, which sealed the game.
  • Historic Hogs: The Razorbacks put up some historic numbers with a 50-13 overall season record, which is the most wins by any Van Horn team; the program had bests 109 home runs and 567 strikeouts by pitchers.

The team received overwhelming support from fans after the loss. Here is to one final huddle. WPS
